p.n: Bundesliga: Borussia Dortmund v Hertha Berlin
p.k: Borussia Dortmund play host to Hertha Berlin in the Bundesliga at Signal Iduna Park

p.n: Premier League World
p.k: We sit down with ex-Arsenal and Napoli goalkeeper David Ospina, Manchester United's Bruno Fernandes and Arsenal right-back Hector Bellerin

p.n: RKJ - Sailing Legend
p.k: The story of how Sir Robin Knox-Johnston made history when he became the first man to sail solo and non-stop around the globe in 1968-69

p.n: BT Sport Mic'd Up: BT Sport Mic'd Up: Lee Bowyer
p.k: The BT Sport Mic'd Up team and Jake Humphrey go behind-the-scenes at Charlton and follow manager Lee Bowyer for the day ahead of their derby with Millwall

p.n: FIM Speedway Highlights
p.k: All the best action from round seven of the FIM Speedway Grand Prix season from Vojens, Denmark

p.n: Panafrica Rally
p.k: Action from the Panafrica Rally in Morocco

p.n: Hellas Rally Raid
p.k: Action from the Hellas Rally Raid in Athens, Greece

p.n: Rolex Invitationals Regatta
p.k: Action from the 2020 Rolex Invitationals Regatta Yacht Club in New York

p.n: Women's Commonwealth Bank T20I Series: Women's T20: India v England
p.k: The best of the action from the 2020 Women's Commonwealth Bank T201 Tri-Series meeting between India and England in Canberra

p.n: Women's Commonwealth Bank T20I Series: Women's T20: Australia v England
p.k: A look back at all the action from the 2020 Women's Commonwealth Bank T201 Tri-Series as Australia and England meet in Canberra

n.u: Hockey: Men's Hockey: NZL v GB

p.n: Hockey: Men's Hockey: NZL v GB 2020
p.k: Action from the Men's FIH Hockey Pro League as New Zealand and Great Britain face-off. Both sides will be hoping to secure their first win of the campaign

n.u: Hockey: Men's Hockey: NZL v GBR

p.n: Hockey: Men's Hockey: NZL v GBR 2020
p.k: Great Britain took on New Zealand in the Men's FIH Hockey Pro League at the North Harbour Hockey Stadium in Auckland at the start of the year

p.n: 30 for 30: Hawaiian: The Legend of Eddie Aikau
p.k: This documentary, part of the award-winning 30 for 30 series, chronicles the remarkable life and times of Eddie Aikau, the legendary Hawaiian big wave surfer

p.n: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
p.k: See all your favourite WWE SmackDown Superstars deliver edge-of-your-seat action, including Roman Reigns, Sasha Banks, `The Fiend' Bray Wyatt and Brock Lesnar

p.n: 30 for 30: Marion Jones: Press Pause
p.k: From Olympic athlete to inmate, Marion Jones recounts how it felt in that long and yet all-too short drive to prison. Part of the award-winning 30 for 30 series

p.n: 30 for 30: 30 for 30: The Best That Never Was
p.k: Marcus Dupree was the biggest, fastest running back in high school history. In college, his career ended before it ever truly began

p.n: 30 for 30: 30 for 30: Without Bias
p.k: A look back at the death of Len Bias from a cocaine-induced heart attack, two days after Boston selected him in the 1986 NBA Draft. Part of the acclaimed 30 for 30 series

p.n: 30 for 30: ESPN Films: Roll Tide War Eagle
p.k: Find out about one of the fiercest rivalries in college sport between Alabama and Auburn. Hear from the school's icons on how the rivalry

p.n: 30 for 30: ESPN Films: Baltimore Boys
p.k: ESPN Films looks at the untold story of one of the greatest high school basketball teams ever, Dunbar High School in Baltimore, and the tumultuous times
